title: BBQ Grilling & Firepit Lounge Area, Wood-Style Flooring*
map_address: 3324 S Field St near S. Estes St.  and W Girton Dr
posting_body: The Ranch at Bear Creek Apartments & Townhomes offer spacious, garden-style homes feature a variety of elegant updates designed to elevate your living experience.
Wood-style flooring adds warmth and beauty and laundry day will be a breeze with a washer and dryer in each home.
Use this link for more info:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 865 Sq.
- Resident Clubhouse with Fitness Center & Business Center
- On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, and On-Call Courtesy Patrol
- Pet-Friendly Community With Dog Park & Dog Wash Station
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
The Ranch at Bear Creek Apartments & Townhomes
